interesting_trivia: there's a 'sunk' entry in the file. fpr SUNKISS DROP
The actual entries for the Japanese and English versions are 'sunj' and 'sune' respectively

warning: DDRMAX JP doesn't have values for the difficulties, so they will be saved as 0
You will have to manually set them later in the file.

interesting_trivia: there's 3 'ropp' entries in the file (the content is the same)
And then 'ropp1', 'ropp2' and 'ropp3' taht are the actual different versions of Roppongi EVOLVED
